content.rendered:
Judy: What kind of jobs do most dogs work?
Frank: I don’t know, what kind of jobs do most dogs work?
Judy: Roofing.

Today is National Bowling Day. And though I haven’t been bowling in many years, I have enjoyed bowling in the past.

It seems to me if you are a pro-bowler, then every day is a good day to bowl. If you are like me, you have to wait for someone to invite you to go bowling. Maybe you are somewhere in between and you go bowling a few times a year.

I think that the last time I bowled was at least five years ago and was related to a company party.

If you are one of those in the middle, consider inviting others to go bowling with you. If you have family, invite them. Bowling can be a lot of fun. Let me know what you think in the comments below. Thanks and have a great National Bowling Day, whatever you choose to do.
